tool_description: Corrects OCR errors in extracted text using spell checking, historical name databases, and contextual analysis for genealogical documents.

quality_report.description: Quality validation results identifying error locations

document_type.description: Document classification to apply appropriate correction rules

historical_context.description: Time period context for name and place correction

error_messages: Empty text input: Provide OCR extracted text for correction.
Invalid quality report: Quality validation results must be provided.
Correction processing failed: Text may contain unsupported formatting.
Historical database unavailable: Name correction may be limited.
Insufficient context: Document type helps improve correction accuracy.
usage: Input original OCR text with quality_report from Text Quality Validator, specify document_type and historical_context for better correction accuracy, enable preserve_original to maintain source text record.

corrections_made.description: List of corrections applied with before/after examples

uncertain_corrections.description: Corrections with low confidence requiring review
